I think this story teaches the readers why the protagonist is a lolicon. One might think loliconism is a crime but in actual fact when you think about how the small Hanekawa grows up to become a girl with giant pair of titties, you can see her as more than a simple loli. She is a Future Investment and Araragi is an intelligent investor.
